InitAll - Class in org.controller
The `InitAll` class initializes and manages the main components of the game, including game screens, saved games, and map selection.
InitAll() - Constructor for class org.controller.InitAll
Constructs the `InitAll` class, setting up initial configurations and managing the game's main threads (Swing elements, and the business logic are running on different threads).
